import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import React from 'react'; import { Button, Container, Nav, Navbar, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../App.css'; // Ensure this file contains your custom styles import esgIcon from '../assets/img/icon_esg.png'; import GreenTrendz from '../assets/img/logo1-2.png'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; import image from '../assets/img/hero_1.jpg'; import heroImage2 from '../assets/img/hero_2.jpg'; import heroImage3 from '../assets/img/hero_3.jpg'; import heroImage4 from '../assets/img/hero_4.jpg'; import heroImage5 from '../assets/img/hero_5.jpg'; import imgLong5 from '../assets/img/img_long_5.png'; const HomePage = () => { // Hero Section Styles const heroStyles = { height: '70vh', backgroundImage: `url(${image})`, // Use imported image for hero backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', color: 'white', }; return (
{/* Header with Navbar */}
Services About Us Contact
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Carousel Item 1 */}

Empower Your Business for a Sustainable Future

With GreenTrendz, turn your ESG goals into reality through intelligent data management and comprehensive reporting.

{/* Carousel Item 2 */}

Unleash the Power of Your Data to Visualize Your ESG Journey.

Design interactive dashboards that showcase your company’s sustainability achievements.

{/* Carousel Item 3 */}

Quantify Your Environmental Footprint

Monitor your carbon emissions and resource usage to drive sustainable practices.

{/* Carousel Item 4 */}

Build a Better Community Through Social Responsibility

Measure Your Social Contributions and Strengthen Corporate Responsibility

{/* Carousel Item 5 */}

Strengthen Your Governance Framework

Governance in ESG focuses on Board Composition, Risk Management, and Ethics & Compliance.

{/* Carousel Controls */}
    {/* Services Section */}

    SERVICES

    Your Partners in Growth and Development

    {/* Service 1: ESG Reporting */}

    ESG Reporting

    01

    We follow comprehensive ESG standards to ensure businesses are sustainable and responsible.

    • Environment, Social, Governance compliance
    • Stakeholder engagement
    • Risk and opportunity assessment
    {/* Service 2: BRSR - SEBI Framework */}

    BRSR - SEBI Framework

    02

    Aligning your reporting with SEBI’s BRSR framework for effective sustainability disclosures.

    • Governance, leadership, and accountability
    • Key performance indicators
    • Financial risk disclosure
    {/* Service 3: GRI Reporting Framework */}

    GRI Reporting Framework

    03

    Implementing the GRI standards to disclose sustainability impacts effectively.

    • Materiality assessment
    • Disclosure transparency
    • Performance tracking
    {/* Service 4: PCAF - Carbon Accounting */}

    PCAF - Carbon Accounting

    04

    Measuring and managing carbon emissions to meet climate goals using PCAF methodology.

    • Carbon footprint calculation
    • Emission reduction strategies
    • Alignment with global climate goals
    {/* Service 5: Dashboard */}

    Dashboard

    05

    Interactive data visualization tools for tracking sustainability metrics.

    • Real-time data analysis
    • Visualization of ESG metrics
    • Customizable reporting options
    {/* Footer Section */}

    © 2024 GreenTrendz. All rights reserved.
    ); }; export default HomePage;
